title: Expected Attendees at Tonight’s China State Dinner | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
September 25, 2015

 



Expected Attendees at Tonight’s China State Dinner





	Below is a list of expected attendees at tonight’s China State Dinner. Additional details about the State Dinner are available here.

	The President and Mrs. Obama 

	His Excellency Xi Jinping, The President of the People's Republic of China, and Madame Peng Liyuan

	 

	The Honorable Madeleine Albright, Former Secretary of State, U.S. Department of State, and Chair, Albright Stonebridge Group

	Ms. Alice Albright
